name: Color Shooter (Elra)
description:
Match the color of your laser with the enemies and destroy them ! If you shot an enemy with a wrong color, you lose a point.

Be careful, difficulty increases with your score !

Controls:
Rotate - Q/D or A/D
Shoot lasers - Arrow keys
Escape - Pause / Settings

This game has been created by the two of us during the confinement to pass time together.  It's the first Unity project for one of us, so the game is pretty simple because we wanted to learn while having fun. Still, we are proud to present you this game and we hope that you'll have fun :)

Elra & canu1337
